sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ice is re-forged by [[Tobho Mott]] rather than a smith from Volantis. The knowledge of reworking Valyrian steel is still a closely guarded secret, but by the smiths of [[Qohor]], who number much more than three. The sword smith in the episode is not stated to be Volantene, only established there, so it's possible he could still be Qohorik.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Established on [[Volantis]], he is the most skilled smith in [[the known world]]. He is one of only three smiths in the world who can re-work [[Valyrian steel]].
===[[Season 4]]===
At the request of [[Tywin Lannister]] he travels to [[King's Landing]] and melts down [[House Stark]]'s Valyrian steel greatsword [[Ice]] into two smaller swords. Tywin gives [[Oathkeeper (sword)|one]] of these to his son [[Jaime Lannister|Jaime]], and the [[Widow's Wail|other]] to his grandson, [[Joffrey Baratheon|King Joffrey]].<ref>"[[Two Swords]]"</ref>
